title: Antietam National Battlefield: Collections
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Collections               Collections      Antietam National Battlefield has thousands of original items in it's collection. With the limited amout of space in the park visitor center, only a few put are on display, most are kept in protective storage. Click on the different links to view photographs of some of our historic items. Each page includes a gallery for larger images of the original artifacts.  Â     Captain John Tompkins commanded an artillery battery at Antietam.    Henry Kyd Douglas was on General "Stonewall" Jackson's staff and lived just four miles from the battlefield.
